column5: A friend has a four year old Terrova and stowing and deploying is no fun. Are the MotorGuide Digitals easier -says one hand stow and deploy? Any feedback would be appreciated
i would stay with the terrova......one word...IPILOT!!!!!
Terrova is so easy to deploy are you sure it isn't a powerdrive? Terrova is the best electric steer out there not to mention ipilot
yeah.. terrova is SOOOO easy to deploy... you might be thinking about the powerdrive.. now that one is a pain the rear.
I have the Motorguide wireless... it is quite easy to stow and deploy, but not really a one handed operation. Maybe once it breaks in a bit more... or maybe I am too gentle on my stuff LOL...
